articleContent.title: Arpeggio: Minor b6th in G# (Shape: E)
articleContent.content:
# Arpeggio: Minor b6th in G# (Shape: E)

## Brief Presentation
This arpeggio is a Minor b6th arpeggio played in the key of G# using the E shape. It consists of the notes G#, B, D# and F#. 

## Notes and Intervals
- G# (Root)
- B (Minor 3rd)
- D# (Perfect 5th)
- F# (Minor 6th)

## Musical Genre and Flavor
This arpeggio is often used in genres like blues, jazz, and metal where a darker or more tense flavor is desired. The addition of the b6th adds a unique and somewhat haunting quality to melodies or solos.

## Songs
- "Black" by Pearl Jam
- "Sweet Child o' Mine" by Guns N' Roses
- "All Along the Watchtower" by Jimi Hendrix
